please follow the naming convention for the project
https://github.com/openbmc/docs/blob/master/cpp-style-and-conventions.md#variables

Can you explain how this works?
Also, need to check slowVector.size() > 0
Why Slot is uint8_T type, It must be string. Slot can be "G1" , "H2" etc..  It Need not to be guaranteed number always.

Slot and Socket under memory in redfish dmtf are integers. And also in MemoryLocation.interface.yaml 
(..phosphor-dbus-interfaces/yaml/xyz/openbmc_project/Inventory/
Item/Dimm/MemoryLocation.interface.yaml) considered as byte.
make sense to use the same type as the interface
Hmmm Not in favor, ideally we should change dbus-interfaces and also propose same to DMTF to change it. But since its there as Int in DMTF, I am going with approval.
Can we move this to line 140 so that all dimmXXX commands are grouped together?

Do we need 8/9 ? We support only upto Socket#7 right?

Also, can you put a comment explaining what type of substring you are looking for? Is the find_first_of the right logic to be used?
Fixed. Now the logic is been changed to finding CPU string from deviceLocator and then extract slot number from it.
stoi can throw exceptions. Please handle it: https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/string/basic_string/stol
Socket number always prefixed with "CPU" So better to use "CPU" prefix instead of "_" delimiter.
Fixed. Exception handling implemented for stoi logic.

Assumption of SLOT number as ways the last one is also wrong. So better check for "DIMM_" prefix and determine the slot number.
Ex: "BANK 1 CPU0 DIMM_B" Where "B" is slot number
nit: can we call this memoryTech?

This is taken according to interface only(Dimm.interface.yaml).  
- name: MemoryMedia
      type: enum[self.MemoryTech]
      default: Unknown
Is this needed? dimm.hpp has the same already
Maybe string_view can be used here
std::string_view will have advantage over std::string when it is passed as an argument in a function(which avoids expensive copies).
Please show result of the introspect with a Location string example"

what would the slot be for example: 1) CPU0 DIMM_A or 2) CPU0 DIMM_12?
Should we consider use the Bank number as the slot for 1), example "BANK 0 CPU0 DIMM_A" -> slot 0
Slot will be A, B , C  up to L.
Done. Changed the logic to extract slot and socket.
Updated logic for slot and socket extraction from Location code and response for review comments given
same, size_t or auto and move it before use
please add comments to explain the limitation/assumption, so it is easier to extend in the future

please re-order the code so it is easier to follow:
Here is the logic:
1. find cpuPos, if found do 2 and 3 
2. find socketString
3. convert it to socketNum
4. find dimmPos, if find do 5 and 6
5. find slotString
6. convert it to slot
Re-ordered the code as per comments. Thanks
Given responses for the review comments and code re-ordered as per the comments.
this section can be moved after line 214
This section can be after line 235
Modified and re-ordered code as per the comments.
